parameters.name: is_favorite
parameters.description: Return only favorite recipes in user favorite list

true.summary: Return only favorite recipes in user favorite list

false.summary: Return only non-favorite recipes in user favorite list

additionalProperties.description: Whatever you pass to request body will be present here under the same key, with the same value.

start_date.description: The start date for the plan.

end_date.description: The end date for the plan.

start_date.description: The start date for the target.

description.description: A brief description of the target (optional).

youtube_video.description: Link to a YouTube video related to the recipe.

ingredients.description: List of ingredients required for the recipe.

instructions.description: List of instructions to prepare the recipe.

categories.description: List of categories the recipe belongs to.
